name: DemonDuel
description:
Demon Duel is a -2 player game-

When you get trapped inside a giant sandwurm, you have to fight your way out against a horde of demons. Taking turns switching places with the soul-stealing demon: Todd.

After each round, the two players switch roles. In your human form, you gain demon blood for killing monsters and damaging the demon. In your demon form, you get gold for killing the human and avoiding damage.

Upgrade your abilities in both the human and the demon form and take down your opponent to win.

Controls:

WASD - human movement

IJKL - human shooting

LShift - human dash

Left/ Right Arrow keys - demon movement

Up/ Down Arrow keys - demon swap spells

Mouse - demon aim and shoot (LMB)
